scenes.background: [Monica] and [Bob] exchange glances, then return their attention to the screen as you allocate more time for the task.
scenes.description: 'We appreciate it. Can you also join our meeting later to discuss the next steps?'

options.text: Sure, I can join the meeting. Let's make the most of this session.
options.analysis: You showed strong empathy and willingness to collaborate by committing to the meeting, but your self-regulation and motivation to maintain your leave were slightly lower.

options.text: I can join briefly, but I won't be able to stay for the entire meeting.
options.analysis: You balanced your time off with a willingness to help by agreeing to join briefly, showing good self-regulation, but your motivation and empathy were not particularly high.

options.text: It's better if you handle this without my full involvement. Follow the guidelines.
options.analysis: You maintained strong self-regulation by maintaining your boundaries, but your perception, empathy, and motivation to help were lower.
